categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Crucitorn was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order. During the Battle of Nar Shaddaa, Crucitorn became immolated by the Flame-Wielders, but managed to endure the pain and fought back. Jedi Master Dooku used Crucitorn as an example when demonstrating pain endurance to his Padawan Qui-Gon Jinn.
